Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe aligns perfectly with your needs and aspirations. Given its exceptional value and unique features, I am confident it will significantly contribute to your success and well-being.

Considering the immense worth of the product to you, valued at $1500000, I propose a transaction price of $1250000. This offer represents a remarkable opportunity to secure such a high-value item at a competitive price, ensuring you maximize your investment while enjoying the unparalleled benefits this product has to offer.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am here to answer any questions or address any concerns you might have. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this exceptional product into your life.

Best regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,250,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,250,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
